message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a price that I think you'll find reasonable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9500 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe I can find a better deal. I am willing to pay $10000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll meet you at $10250, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for your offer. I am willing to pay $10000 for the product, which is the highest I can go.
